content: @Timothy Chow asked "if anyone has tried [to] axiomatize Carnot's arguments in a way that would be satisfying to a mathematician with no knowledge of physics?" on the FOM (Foundations of Mathematics) mailing list: https://lists.ugent.be/wws/arc/fom/2023-07/msg00015.html.
(note that the spam protection mechanism at that link sends you to the homepage after clicking it; just click the link again and it will take you to the right place the second time)
